    • Constructor Detail

      • VanillaEventLoop

        public VanillaEventLoop​(@Nullable
                        @Nullable net.openhft.chronicle.core.threads.EventLoop parent,
                        String name,
                        Pauser pauser,
                        long timerIntervalMS,
                        boolean daemon,
                        String binding,
                        Set<net.openhft.chronicle.core.threads.HandlerPriority> priorities)
        Parameters:
        parent - the parent event loop
        name - the name of this event handler
        pauser - the pause strategy
        timerIntervalMS - how long to pause, Long.MAX_VALUE = always check.
        daemon - is a demon thread
        binding - set affinity description, "any", "none", "1", "last-1"
